description: This file defines React functional components for UI cards, including Card, CardHeader, and CardBody, each with specific props and rendering logic.

methods.name: Card
methods.description: A simple card component that wraps children in a div with class 'card' and optional additional className.

methods.name: CardHeader
methods.description: A header for the card, displaying title, optional subtitle, and optional actions, styled with layout classes.

methods.name: CardBody
methods.description: A container for card content, wrapping children in a styled div.
